Text: I don't know why, but seeders just fall off. I will stop uploading, if I have to keep waiting for sufficient seeders for infinity, when nearly everyone is a "HIT and RUN".
Some people are just pricks. Can't help it unfortunately. Don't know what the big deal is with keeping uTorrent running after you get your stuff.
@ 'lewsur' - Thanks for the supporting comment Mate :)
